channel.title: Help me! NPC's hitting 100s
channel.description:
I'm new at coding, and all npc's i spawn are hitting crazy numbers like 42, 67, and 100. Any simple fixes? I need them to hit 0-1s prefferably not above 10. Thanks.
EDIT: Can somebody tell me how to set the default on fraction of hp that is the monsters hit? Thanks.

item.title: Help me! NPC's hitting 100s
item.dc:creator: @jandascape90 jandascape90
item.description:
@jandascape90 wrote:

Thanks, I will try that!
I had theyre hp set to 1000 :rolleyes:

also how do i set default?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! NPC's hitting 100s
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

lol wat r u putting there hp at? or r u just clicking ::npc ####

cuz if ur doing the ::npc thing thats not the way

spawn then thru autospawn.cfg

and change there hp to 100 or lower if u want them 2 hit that low

im 2 lazy 2 check but ur server probably defaults to divide by 10… most servers 100

just make it under 100 hp so it hits 10 at max

Read full topic
